=head1 NAME

Gantry::Stash::Controller - Stash object for the controller

=head1 SYNOPSIS

    $self->stash->controller->data( {} );

=head1 DESCRIPTION

Controller data is an alternative to things like pnotes for data you want
to track during a single requiest.

=head1 METHODS

=over 4

=item data

=back
